text:
Hello Janice, 

The enlarged video display looks really good. I just found a minor error at the time stamp <<00:02:23>>; 

the sentence should read "Enter the Group's details and submit" and not "Enter the Groups's details and submit". 

Apart from that, everything else looks really great. Can you please make this minor change in your spare time ? You can make this change whenever you feel like doing it, there's no rush.

I also apologize for the delay in informing you about the same. I had Internet connectivity issues for the past few days, hence I couldn't submit my review on time. Please excuse me. 

Thank you for your contribution.

text:
<<00:02:14>>

To create a group, either **tap on the pop-up menu at the top right** ............ and **tap on the "+" button.** Enter the **Group's** ...........

<<00:02:34>>
To create a center, either **tap on the pop-up menu at the top right** ............ and **tap on the "+" button.**

<<00:02:46>>
......... **Next, select the pop-up menu at the top right.** ..........

<<00:03:20>>
......... **Next, select the pop-up menu at the top right.** ..........


<<00:09:04>>
Firstly, to turn on Offline Mode, select the three-bar button **at the top left**.
.....
.....
....
Add clients, groups, or centers by **tapping on the pop-up menu at the top right.**
In the Offline Sync section, **you will be able to view your created clients, groups, and/or centers.**
To sync your creations, firstly, switch off the **"Offline Mode"** switch
--------------------------------``````-----------------------------
If you need any help, please let us know. We'll be glad to assist you. 
: )
task_definition_name: Create a screencast to demonstrate the use of Android Field Officer App

text:
Hello Janice,

Amazing work ! I really liked your screen-cast. 

I noticed a few errors in the video, can you please correct them.

1-> Can you please replace the phrase "the three dots button" with the phrase "the pop-up menu".

2-> Can you also replace the phrase "on/in the top right corner" with "at the top right corner".

3-> Can you also make the following changes at the respective time stamps -
      (The part that has been corrected is surrounded by **.) 

<<00:00:11>>
If I am not mistaken, there is an extra whitespace between "by" and "entering" in the third line, can you please correct that.
Also, can you correct the last sentence, it should read "at the top right corner".

<<00:01:10>>
Can you replace the word "lists" with "list" in the first line.
There is also a typographical error in the third line ("lke" instead of "like"). 

<<00:01:37>>
To create a client either **tap on the pop-up menu at the top right** or .......... submit.

More ->>
